alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ulster; Schoharie; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ulster, west central Dutchess, western Greene and south central Schoharie Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Roxbury to near Montgomery. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Kingston, New Paltz, Ellenville, Hunter, Wallkill, Hyde Park, Milton, Plattekill, Hurley, Woodstock, Wappingers Falls, Highland, Windham, Prattsville, High Falls, Tillson, Napanoch, Woodland Valley Campground and Phoenicia. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 18 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ulster; Schoharie; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster
